author: hlship
msg: TAP5-664: Incorrect "legacy" URI specified in the templates documentation

author: cziegeler
msg: Add default configuration for html pages and use resource api instead of jcr api.

author: berndf
msg: [vysper] VYSPER-17 (was: LABS-354): storage service reg, sustantial changes. Changing storage between in-memory and JCR is changing only one line of code now. all storages share a common interface and registry in the runtime context. two one-method interfaces AccountCreation and AccountVerification have been merged to make this more elegantly possible. UserAuthorization need no longer be exposed through the server runtime context. Adding users is now possible for in-memory user authorization, too. A bug when installing a single module has been fixed (initialize() not called).

author: jukka
msg: OCM-1: Move jackrabbit-ocm to JCR Commons
All nodemanagement code is now merged, no need for the separate component.
